import React from 'react' import { Link, useParams} from 'react-router-dom' import { Row, Col, Image, ListGroup, Button, Card, ListGroupItem} from 'react-bootstrap' import Rating from '../components/Rating' import products from '../products' function ProductScreen({ match }) { const { id } = useParams(); console.log(products, 'All Products') const product = products.find((p) => p._id === id) console.log(product, 'This is Product') return (
Go Back {product && } {product &&

{product.name}

}
) } export default ProductScreen
